attributes.action: An opportunity for young people to learn about taxes, mortgages, and how to vote
attributes.background: I found whilst in education there was not enough teaching about taxes, mortgages, and how to vote. I feel strongly that if young people were taught about this then we may be able to help them in their future and provide a better understanding of what it is like to be an adult.

rejection.details: If you'd like these subjects to be taught in schools, or if you'd like the Government to make education on these subjects available to young people in a different way (such as online), you could start a petition calling for that.
